name: Bonfire Idle Clicker Defense
description:
This game was developed in 48 hours for the bonfire game jam, hosted by Spelkollektivet, a Co-Working and Co-Living Space for game developers.

You start with a hero to defend the bonfire! But there will be enemies coming from other directions, so you can't do it alone, and you need more heroes to defend the bonfire! 

Click on the enemies to destroy them and defend the bonfire.
Click on your heros to upgrade them and make them stronger.
If you have killed enough enemies you can go to the next level, by clicking the arrow in the right top corner. The enemies getting stronger, but you will also get more gold.
If it gets to difficult you can click "Ascend" to reset everything, but next time you get more gold!
